    com.vectorprint.configuration.binding

      Modifier and Type Class and Description

      The decoration pattern is advised if you need different behaviour on top of the two implementaions of the BindingHelper interface offered by this library.
      class  BindingHelperImpl
      Responsible for converting Strings into (atomic) values and vise versa and for escaping meaningful characters for a certain syntax.

      Classes in com.vectorprint.configuration.binding.parameters that implement BindingHelper 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractParamBindingHelperDecorator 
      class  EscapingBindingHelper
      implementation for the syntax supported by PropertiesParser, escapes ',', '|' and ')', , uses '|' as separator for array values Threadsafe: it is safe to call the available methods from different threads at the same time on one instance of this class.
      class  ParamBindingHelperImpl

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  JSONBindingHelper
      implemenation supports json syntax, does not escape values, uses ',' as separator for array values
